contents.text: Welcome to Accenture San Francisco, your global management consulting and professional services firm.
For consulting services and solutions, press 1.
For strategy and operations consulting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our strategy and operations team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a strategy consulting session to streamline our team's workflows quickly.
I need advice on improving the operational efficiency of my veteran support organization.
Discuss optimizing supply chain operations using Lean Six Sigma methodology.
I want to discuss improving operations for my small family store.
Discover how Accenture's strategy and operations team can help optimize my physics lab's workflows.

contents.text: For technology and digital transformation services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technology and digital transformation consultants.

navigationGoals: Discuss digital transformation options for migrating our infrastructure to the cloud.
I want to explore technology solutions to digitize our veteran outreach services.
Evaluate migrating our on-prem infrastructure to a cloud-native microservices architecture.
I need advice on setting up an online website for my home craft business.
Ask how their technology consultants can implement AI-based data analysis for my research.

contents.text: For recruitment, careers, and human resources, press 2.
For career opportunities and job applications, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our recruitment team.

navigationGoals: Inquire about and apply for open consulting positions in the San Francisco office.
I’d like to apply for strategy consulting roles and learn about the application process.
Submit my application for the data engineering position at the San Francisco office.
I need help applying for a part-time consulting position.
Find out about internship opportunities and the application process for physics students.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our human resources department.

navigationGoals: Resolve an issue with my employee benefits package as soon as possible.
I have questions about Accenture’s veteran hiring policies and employee benefits.
Get clarification on employee benefits enrollment and 401(k) plan integration.
I need assistance updating my contact details and understanding my pension benefits.
Get information from HR on onboarding requirements and benefits for student interns.
